rules.name: beRadius
rules.description: maximum horizontal distance from the player block events will be stepped through

rules.name: includeInvalidBlockEvents
rules.description: step through block events executed on the wrong block (these will never do anything)

rules.name: losslessBedrockBreaking
rules.description: changes one line of code that makes lossless bedrock breaking possible again (barely)

rules.name: vanillaPistonAnimations
rules.description: tells carpet clients the game isn't frozen, allowing piston animations to play immediately
